home blog resources

Conferences

A sorted list of lists of conferences.

  • General
    • mathmeetings.net: a list for research mathematics conferences, workshops, summer schools etc. Some subsets of this list are displayed on pages listed below.
    • Society for Industrial and Applied Mathematics conferences and events
    • American Mathematical Society mathematics calendar
    • Sage workshops
  • Number theory
    • Johann Birnick's list of number theory conferences: a front-end of mathmeetings.net filtered for listings tagged number theory.
    • Number Theory Web: a collection of links to online information of interest to number theorists. In particular note the conferences page.
    • NmbrThry: the Number Theory Net.
    • Women in Number Theory
    • Kiran S. Kedlaya's list of arithmetic geometry conferences: a front-end of mathmeetings.net filtered for listings tagged algebraic geometry or number theory.
  • Commutative algebra
    • commalg.org
  • Algebraic geometry
    • Ravi Vakil's list of algebraic geometry conferences
    • eager-gen: European algebraic geometry network.
    • The COW seminar: of interest to UK mathematicians, including research students, interested in algebraic geometry in the wide sense.
    • Kiran S. Kedlaya's list of arithmetic geometry conferences: a front-end of mathmeetings.net filtered for listings tagged algebraic geometry or number theory.
  • Geometry and topology
    • London geometry and topology seminar
  • Computer science
    • CS Theory
    • International Association for Cryptologic Research
